2.3.1 Whitespace characters:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters'>
        <property name='allowByTailComment' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEscapesForControlCharacters' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowNonPrintableEscapes' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
2.3.2 Special escape sequences:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters'>
        <property name='allowByTailComment' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEscapesForControlCharacters' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowNonPrintableEscapes' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
2.3.3 Non-ASCII characters:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters'>
        <property name='allowByTailComment' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEscapesForControlCharacters' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowNonPrintableEscapes' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
3 Source file structure:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='PackageDeclaration'>
                        <property name='id' value='PackageDeclaration'/>
                        <property name='format' value='^package\\s.*'/>
                      </module>
                      <module name='ImportControl'>
                        <property name='id' value='ImportControl'/>
                        <property name='option' value='bottom'/>
                        <property name='eachGroupHas' value='1'/>
                        <property name='eachLineHas' value='1'/>
                      </module>
                      <module name='OneTopLevelClass'>
                        <property name='id' value='OneTopLevelClass'/>
                      </module>"
}
3.1 License or copyright information, if:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='Header'>
        <property name='headerType' value='REGEXP'/>
        <property name='headerFile' value='LICENSE|license|COPYING|copying'/>
        <property name='fileExtensions' value='java'/>
    </module>"
}
3.3.3 Ordering and spacing:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='CustomImportOrder'>
        <property name='customImportOrderRules' value='STATIC###STANDARD'/>
        <property name='separated' value='true'/>
        <property name='specialImportsRegExp' value='^javax\\.\\w+'/>
        <property name='sortImportsInGroupAlphabetically' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='STATIC_IMPORT,IMPORT'/>
    </module>"
}
4 Formatting:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='NoWhitespaceBefore'>
                        <property name='allowBeforeComment' value='false'/>
                        <property name='allowBeforeLineComment' value='false'/>
                        <property name='allowBeforeBlockComment' value='false'/>
                        <property name='allowBeforeBlock' value='false'/>
                        <property name='allowBeforeSemicolons' value='false'/>
                      </module>"
}
4.1.1 Use of optional braces:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='NeedBraces'>
                        <property name='id' value='NeedBraces'/>
                        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_WHILE'/>
                    </module>"
}
4.1.2 Nonempty blocks: K & R style:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='LeftCurly'>
        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_IF'/>
    </module>"
}
4.2 Block indentation: +2 spaces:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='2'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='2'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5.1 Where to break:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='OperatorWrap'>
        <property name='allowLineBreakAfterDot' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowLineBreakAfterDoubleColon' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowLineBreakAfterTypeBoundAmpersand' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowLineBreakAfterCatchPipe' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowLineBreakBeforeAssignment' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowLineBreakBeforeColon' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowLineBreakBeforeMethodReference' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowLineBreakBeforeComma' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowLineBreakBeforeArrow' value='false'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5.2 Indent continuation lines at least:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='4'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='0'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='0'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='0'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='4'/>
    </module>"
}
4.6.2 Horizontal whitespace:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='ASSIGN, COLON, DIV, EQUAL, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_WHILE, MINUS, MOD, NOT_EQUAL, PLUS, QUESTION, SL, SR, STAR'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAround'>
        <property name='tokens' value='ASSIGN, COLON, DIV, EQUAL, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_WHILE, MINUS, MOD, NOT_EQUAL, PLUS, QUESTION, SL, SR, STAR'/>
    </module>"
}
4.6.3 Horizontal alignment: never requir:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters'>
        <property name='allowByTailComment' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEscapesForControlCharacters' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowNonPrintableEscapes' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
4.7 Grouping parentheses: recommended:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='UnnecessaryParentheses'>
                        <property name='allowInMethodInvocation' value='false'/>
                        <property name='allowInMethodDeclaration' value='false'/>
                        <property name='allowInOperator' value='false'/>
                      </module>"
}
4.8.7 Modifiers:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='ModifierOrder'>
                        <property name='id' value='ModifierOrder'/>
                        <property name='tokens' value='PUBLIC, PROTECTED, PRIVATE, ABSTRACT, DEFAULT, STATIC, FINAL, TRANSIENT, VOLATILE, SYNCHRONIZED, NATIVE, STRICTFP'/>
                    </module>"
}
5.2.1 Package names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='PackageName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z]+(\\.[a-z][a-z0-9]*)*$'/>
        <property name='illegalFormat' value='^[A-Z]|[_]'/>
        <property name='message' value='Package name must be in lowercase and not contain underscores'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.7 Local variable names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='LocalVariableName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        <property name='ignoreFinal' value='false'/>
        <property name='ignoreConst' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
5.3 Camel case: defined:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='AbbreviationAsWordInName'>
        <property name='format' value='correct'/>
    </module>
    <module name='ConstantName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[A-Z][A-Z0-9]*(_[A-Z0-9]+)*$'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MethodName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
    </module>"
}
6.2 Caught exceptions: not ignored:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='IllegalCatch'>
        <property name='format' value='^Illegal catch - .*'/>
        <property name='ignoreCatchWithName' value='expected.*'/>
    </module>"
}

{

                        <property name='allowSingleParagraph' value='false'/>
